mapper.select: SELECT serve.id, serve.sale_status, serve.serve_item_id, item.name AS serve_item_name, item.serve_type_id, serve.region_id, item.reference_price, serve.price, serve.is_hot, serve.create_time, serve.update_time, type.name AS serve_type_name FROM serve inner JOIN serve_item AS item ON serve.serve_item_id = item.id inner JOIN serve_type AS type ON item.serve_type_id = type.id WHERE serve.region_id = #{regionId}

SELECT type.id as serve_type_id, type.name as serve_type_name, type.serve_type_icon, serve.city_code, serve.id as serve_id, item.id as serve_item_id, item.name as serve_item_name, item.serve_item_icon, item.sort_num as serve_item_sort_num FROM serve inner JOIN serve_item AS item ON item.id = serve.serve_item_id inner JOIN serve_type AS type ON type.id = item.serve_type_id WHERE serve.region_id = #{regionId} AND serve.sale_status = 2 ORDER BY type.sort_num, item.sort_num

SELECT type.id, type.name, type.sort_num, type.img FROM serve inner JOIN serve_item AS item ON item.id = serve.serve_item_id inner JOIN serve_type AS type ON type.id = item.serve_type_id WHERE serve.region_id = #{regionId} AND serve.sale_status = 2 ORDER BY type.sort_num, item.sort_num

SELECT serve.city_code, serve.serve_item_id, item.name as serve_item_name, item.unit, item.detail_img, serve.price, item.img as serve_item_img, serve.id as id FROM serve inner JOIN serve_item AS item ON item.id = serve.serve_item_id WHERE serve.region_id = #{regionId} AND serve.sale_status = 2 AND serve.is_hot = 1 ORDER BY item.sort_num

SELECT serve.city_code, serve.serve_item_id, item.name as serve_item_name, item.unit, item.detail_img, serve.price, item.img as serve_item_img, serve.id as id FROM serve inner JOIN serve_item AS item ON item.id = serve.serve_item_id WHERE serve.id = #{id} AND serve.sale_status = 2 ORDER BY item.sort_num
